result.markdown:
--- title: Plotting author: Marie-Hélène Burle --- It can be convenient to plot directly in the REPL (for instance when using SSH). ::: {.cell execution_count=1} ``` {.julia .cell-code} using UnicodePlots histogram(randn(1000), nbins=40) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=2} ::: {.ansi-escaped-output} ```{=html} 
                ┌                                        ┐ 
   [-3.8, -3.6) ┤▍ 1                                       
   [-3.6, -3.4) ┤  0                                       
   [-3.4, -3.2) ┤█▎ 3                                      
   [-3.2, -3.0) ┤▋ 2                                       
   [-3.0, -2.8) ┤  0                                       
   [-2.8, -2.6) ┤█▎ 3                                      
   [-2.6, -2.4) ┤█▎ 3                                      
   [-2.4, -2.2) ┤█▌ 4                                      
   [-2.2, -2.0) ┤█▊ 5                                      
   [-2.0, -1.8) ┤██████▋ 18                                
   [-1.8, -1.6) ┤██████▋ 18                                
   [-1.6, -1.4) ┤██████▉ 19                                
   [-1.4, -1.2) ┤███████████████▌ 42                       
   [-1.2, -1.0) ┤███████████▍ 31                           
   [-1.0, -0.8) ┤████████████████████▌ 56                  
   [-0.8, -0.6) ┤██████████████████████▍ 61                
   [-0.6, -0.4) ┤████████████████████████▋ 67              
   [-0.4, -0.2) ┤██████████████████████████████▌ 83        
   [-0.2,  0.0) ┤███████████████████████▊ 65               
   [ 0.0,  0.2) ┤█████████████████████████████▍ 80         
   [ 0.2,  0.4) ┤████████████████████████████████████  98  
   [ 0.4,  0.6) ┤████████████████████████████▋ 78          
   [ 0.6,  0.8) ┤████████████████████████▋ 67              
   [ 0.8,  1.0) ┤███████████████████▌ 53                   
   [ 1.0,  1.2) ┤████████████████▊ 46                      
   [ 1.2,  1.4) ┤█████████▉ 27                             
   [ 1.4,  1.6) ┤██████████▍ 28                            
   [ 1.6,  1.8) ┤█████▎ 14                                 
   [ 1.8,  2.0) ┤████▏ 11                                  
   [ 2.0,  2.2) ┤██▎ 6                                     
   [ 2.2,  2.4) ┤▋ 2                                       
   [ 2.4,  2.6) ┤█▊ 5                                      
   [ 2.6,  2.8) ┤  0                                       
   [ 2.8,  3.0) ┤▋ 2                                       
   [ 3.0,  3.2) ┤▋ 2                                       
                └                                        ┘ 
                                 Frequency
``` ::: ::: ::: Most of the time however, you will want to make nicer looking graphs. There are many options to plot in Julia. :::{.example} Example: ::: ::: {.cell execution_count=2} ``` {.julia .cell-code} # First run takes time as the package needs to compile using StatsPlots StatsPlots.histogram(randn(1000), bins=40) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=3} ![](plotting_files/figure-html/cell-3-output-1.svg){} ::: ::: :::{.note} Here, we need to explicitly run `StatsPlots.histogram` rather than `histogram` to prevent a conflict with the function of the same name from the package UnicodePLots. :::
